params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The name of the instance configuration to be deleted. Values are of the form projects/<project>/instanceConfigs/<instance_config>

params.name: data.etag
params.description: Used for optimistic concurrency control as a way to help prevent simultaneous deletes of an instance config from overwriting each other. If not empty, the API only deletes the instance config when the etag provided matches the current status of the requested instance config. Otherwise, deletes the instance config without checking the current status of the requested instance config.

params.name: data.validate_only
params.description: An option to validate, but not actually execute, a request, and provide the same response.
